It seems to just be French.  When I installed it, the descriptions were all in French.  When I loaded it, the text was in English, but the audio was in French.   So I believe it's only French, but if anyone can find a way to load English audio, please tell us, though it doesn't seem to be possible.

I hope an English release comes out soon.  Kinda bummed, wasted a disc.

@angsang_wsj

If you have an American version of the game, the text will all be in English, but the audio will be in French.  I'm not sure if it's the same for PAL, but on my US original copy, it installs fine and the text is in English, but the audio is all in French.

That's just not true.  For example, the NFO says it's  a RF game, but ABGX says it's PAL/NTSC-U only.  Many times you can't trust the NFO.  Sometimes there are bits of misinformation or things not mentioned.
